Text: Thank a Lot, and keep them iOS apps coming.
i have a question...may be a bit juvenile. How do you get these apps on the iphone? After you have downloaded them..
Is there a way to make these apps work with 4s?

*HOW TO PUT "CRACKED" APPS ON IPHONE*
[for people above]

- you need to have a jailbroken iPhone, currently Absinthe jailbreak does the trick (its super, super easy)

- once you have cydia you will need to get "Appsync for IOS 5.x+" & Installous 4.

- once installed you will be able to put IPA files on your iPhone which are cracked apps.

- you can do the easy way of looking for the apps in installous (but the download speed is a lot slower) or access your iPhone through the root method. follow these instructions to do so: 

http://www.iphoneleaks.net/2011/11/how-to-install-deb-file-cydia/

goodluck
